definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: It will happen by surprise in any place and time.
sentences.chinese: 它会随时随地且出奇不意地发生。

sentences.english: You leave me to go to glory; my sad heart will follow you everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我这碎了的心，将随时随地与你同行。

sentences.english: You can read a book anywhere, any time.
sentences.chinese: 但书，你可以随时随地的翻阅。

sentences.english: Make positive self-suggestions whenever I can .
sentences.chinese: 随时随地地做积极的自我暗示。

sentences.english: Village leaders can arbitrarily "readjust" land rights at a moment's notice.
sentences.chinese: 村干部可以随时随地任意“重新调整”土地使用权。

sentences.english: These 4 Kegel exercises are easy to do anywhere, anytime.
sentences.chinese: 这四项凯格尔运动随时随地都可做。

sentences.english: Remember you can do it anytime in any place.
sentences.chinese: 记住你可以随时随地练习。

sentences.english: Read this book and promote it wherever you can.
sentences.chinese: 你应该随时随地的阅读和宣传这本书。

sentences.english: He got further steamed up about reporters who followed him everywhere, everywhen.
sentences.chinese: 他对那些随时随地跟着他的记者暴跳如雷。

sentences.english: Make positive self-suggestions whenever you can.
sentences.chinese: 随时随地做积极的自我暗示。

sentences.english: They revolutionized the workers and peasants at all times and in all places.
sentences.chinese: 他们随时随地向工人和农民灌输革命思想。

sentences.english: Since you can sing anywhere, you can express your love of God anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你开始唱歌，你就能随时随地表达你对上帝的爱。

sentences.english: Users can handwrite phone numbers and messages whenever they want to communicate.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以随时随地手写电话号码，手写短信息。

sentences.english: With cell-phones, you can contact people on the go.
sentences.chinese: 有了行动电话随时随地你都可以联络别人。

sentences.english: Bring your favorit music with you anytime and anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 方便人们在户外随时随地享受音乐带来的无穷乐趣。

sentences.english: B. Keep eyes and ears open for opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 放亮眼睛，竖起耳朵随时随地找寻机会。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
according to the location/everywhere/any place/from any location/from wherever you like
lit. not putting a foot outside/to stay at home
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
